# Kokoro TTS Requirements

# Documentation: https://huggingface.co/hexgrad/Kokoro-82M

# Core TTS package
kokoro>=0.9.2

# Audio processing
soundfile

# Deep learning framework
torch>=2.0.0
torchaudio

# Additional dependencies
numpy
scipy

# macOS: brew install espeak-ng
